entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon.
